org.apache.beam.sdk.util

Class BaseExecutionContext<T extends ExecutionContext.StepContext>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.sdk.util.BaseExecutionContext<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExecutionContext

    public abstract class BaseExecutionContext<T extends ExecutionContext.StepContext>
extends Object
implements ExecutionContext
    Base class for implementations of ExecutionContext.

    A concrete subclass should implement createStepContext(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) to create the appropriate BaseExecutionContext.StepContext implementation. Any StepContext created will be cached for the lifetime of this ExecutionContext.

    BaseExecutionContext is generic to allow implementing subclasses to return a concrete subclass of BaseExecutionContext.StepContext from getOrCreateStepContext(String, String) and getAllStepContexts() without forcing each subclass to override the method, e.g.
